Another film you might enjoy is "Shaun of the Dead" (2004), which combines zombie horror with British humor and features Simon Pegg and Nick Frost as two unlikely heroes trying to survive the apocalypse while navigating their personal lives. It's a great mix of genres that should appeal to fans of Marc Silverstein's work!
